about_the_game:
99Vidas - Original Soundtrack, composed By Rafael Langoni Smith.


Every video game classic is comprised of several parts that make them unique - 99Vidas is no different!

Composed by Rafael Langoni Smith, the Soundtrack for 99Vidas takes us on a journey through a vast diversity of music styles blended with the mood of the great classics of the 8 and 16 bits.

Tracklist



- 01 The Journey Begins

- 02 Guardians of the 99Vidas

- 03 The Choice is Yours

- 04 The Slums

- 05 Imminent Danger

- 06 A Night in the City

- 07 The Game is On

- 08 A Walk in the Park

- 09 Underground

- 10 Full Speed Ahead

- 11 Beach Games

- 12 Funky Flea Market

- 13 Neon Night

- 14 Within Reach

- 15 Child's Play

- 16 Null Reference

- 17 The End is Nigh

- 18 A Bigger Challenge

- 19 The Journey Ends

- 20 To Your Credit

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.0GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 (512MB) / ATI Radeon HD 2900 (512MB)
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66GHz / AMD Phenom
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) / ATI Radeon HD 5850 (1GB)
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M / Intel HD Graphics 4000 / AMD Radeon R9 M290
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

name: 99Vidas - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.0GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 (512MB) / ATI Radeon HD 2900 (512MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 SP2 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66GHz / AMD Phenom
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) / ATI Radeon HD 5850 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
